author: Eliza Mackintosh, CNN
title: What you need to know about coronavirus on Thursday, April 23
description: "It's just too soon." President Donald Trump said he "strongly" disagreed with the Georgia governor's decision to allow beauty salons, barbershops and other businesses to reopen this week, contradicting both his own impatient insistence that states restart th…
content:
